about_the_game:
Your perilous journey into the dark and hostile kingdom is driven by a direct command known as The Writ. This decree, freshly penned by the King of the World of Brightness, is a personal order with a clear and urgent purpose. The King, troubled by reports of increasing unrest and ominous signs from the World of Darkness, has issued The Writ to his most trusted warrior: You.

The Writ outlines a mission of utmost importance. The King, fearing an imminent invasion from the shadowy realm, has commanded You to cross into the World of Darkness and eliminate the perceived threat at its source. Bound by duty and loyalty, You accept The Writ without hesitation. You know the gravity of the King’s words and the trust placed in You. However, as You venture deeper into the dark kingdom, You begin to encounter things that The Writ did not fully prepare You for...

In The Writ, You will engage in intense hack&slash combat, utilizing a variety of melee weapons and combat techniques to overcome relentless enemies. Puzzles will challenge You to navigate through the shadowy realm, revealing hidden paths and secrets. As You progress, You will face moral choices that will not only affect Your journey but also the ultimate outcome of the story. The Writ is clear in its intent, but as You fight Your way through the darkness, You are forced to confront the possibility that there may be more to this mission than simply following orders. The truth behind the King’s decree and the real nature of the enemy becomes a puzzle You must solve, even as You fulfill the letter of The Writ.
